website_summaries.verdict: While care should be taken to ensure you size this wetsuit correctly, once you do, this is a comfortable and well-designed option.
pros: Comes in male and female sizes
Well made, with flat stitching for comfort and rubber reinforcement in stress areas
Extra-long leash and YKK zipper add convenience
cons: Suit can be hard to pull on, due to the zipper not going far enough down the back
Sizes run a little large for women and a little small for men

customer_reviews.title: Great 3mm wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could add an extra star. I love this wetsuit. The water in Southern California is cold all year. This suit prolongs my snorkeling. I am 5'5 (well 5'4 3/4) and around 130lbs 34DD and this suit, the size 5, fits like a glove. All the surf brand ones I've tried or had in the past are sooo crazy tight and uncomfortable up top. I can easily take this suit on and off myself and it seals nicely around my neck. It is great for swimming and doesn't make you feel awkward like some suits do.
customer_reviews.author: Mike+Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Got a 7
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it! We just spent 5 days at Ginnie Springs, the Ichetuknee River, Bob's River Place, and Gilchrist Blue Springs, where the water temp is always a freezing (to me) 72 degrees! I felt no cold at all. The suit went on and off easily and fit so comfortably. I am 5'3, 127 lbs and measure 36-27-37. I was between a 5 and 7, so I took the reviewers advice to go up if between two sizes and I'm glad I did 😉 Hubby is 6'2" 197 lbs, usually wears XL shirts and 34 pants. We ordered him a XXL and it fit just right!
customer_reviews.author: Bling

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at a discount!
customer_reviews.text: Read these reviews before choosing the size! Sounds like the men's sizing (s, m,l) is more accurate than the women's sizing in numbers. I'm 5'6, 135lb, ordered a size 7 after reading these reviews. The sleeves and legs are still too long! Not by much, but there's a little bunching up of material around the forearms/knees/top of back. Doesn't make me look like a hot mermaid :). Don't know how it will perform in the water yet, seems pretty warm. Cost only $60 so I think it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: P.R.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking at two sizes, get the bigger one!
customer_reviews.text: For those on the tall side of the scale... I'm 6' 7" with an athletic build and first tried the 4XL based on the size chart. I could put it on, but it was pretty snug. Worried that 5XL would be too big, but it's just a much better fit. Still skin tight, but not so restrictive in the hips and shoulders. WAY less of a struggle to get in. My specs vs. size chart: 48" in the chest (5XL says 50-52), 40" waist (5XL is 44-46"), and 46" hips (5XL is 49-51") and 260 lbs (5XL 265-287).
customer_reviews.author: JBrady

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wetsuit I have owned, so I don't have others to compare to. I am a female 5'6", 155 lbs, and the size 9 fit me perfectly. There is a little wiggle room in the arms, but it didn't present an issue. I was able to test it out when I capsized in my kayak. The water was approx 56 degrees and it kept me safely warm. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid suit for larger women
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to wear it in the water but it seems of decent quality - certainly for the price. These do fit large as I am a woman's 16 and expected the women's 15 to be an exhausting struggle to put on, but it wasn't at all and had room to spare. Size down for best fit in these.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suit to be able to continue swimming pool exercising through the cooler months (south Louisiana). I do lots of different exercises, and this suit allows me to move freely. I do NOT like cold water, so this was really a test for me. So far, the coldest water temp I've used this suit on was 58 degrees, and I survived just fine. You gradually feel the cold water seep in, but then your body temp kicks in and it's bearable. I was quite amazed how it works! I am 5'6" with long legs and wear a woman's size 6-8. I ordered the size 9 and it's just a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only issue we had was with the "shorter than normal" zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my son and I to dive in some springs in Florida earlier this week. I knew the water would be about 70 degrees, so I wanted a 3 mm suit to keep us warm. These suits did the trick. Our only complaint was the zipper doesn't come as far down the back as most wet suits, making it harder to get on and off. Most of the time, the zipper stops at my lower back, but on this design it is several inches shorter. Other than that, I was completely happy with the suit.
customer_reviews.author: mjmiles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure which size to buy so purchased both 9 and 11 in women's. I am 5'9" weighing 152# with weight evenly distributed for the most part (ha-I'm 61 years old). The 9 fit the best. It's snug like it is supposed to be without being restrictive. Going to use it for diving in Cozumel. in previous years, I've used a dive skin with 3 mm vest, but wanted something just a tad warmer, so hope this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: This wet suit was perfect. It fit well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go snorkeling in the Florida Keys this winter. The water was about 69 degrees and many of the other snorkelers were complaining about the cold water (hey, I grew up in FL so the blood is thin). This wet suit was perfect. It fit well, seems well constructed and kept me at a comfortable temperature. I am sure it would have done so in even colder water. Like any wetsuit, putting it on and getting it off were a challenge, however, I am new to using a wetsuit so I'll chalk that up to my inexperience. This is a great value and very good suit.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fit and protection coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fit and protection coverage. I am 5'7", weighs about 155lbs and size 9 fits perfect. It is snug enough but not too tight. It creates great buoyancy so a weight belt will have to be used when trying to stay below the water for long periods. I already made recommendations so great job Seavenger!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Large sizes are off by two or three sizes... No Good.
customer_reviews.text: It is ridiculous how much the big sizes are off... It looks like these suits are manufactured properly only for small sizes. I have returned now two items after ordering the first one and it was off about 2 sizes. I ordered a larger one and it is still off two sizes... I won't get anything from this seller that has something to do with sizing ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the fabric feels like good quality and construction so for the price I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m ~170, 5”7, size 12 in clothes, the size 11 fit perfectly. I haven’t had a chance to swim in it yet, but the fabric feels like good quality and construction so for the price I’m definitely hanging on to it. I didn’t want to wait right before traveling in case it got delayed. This turned out to be a good strategy, because it did indeed ship late.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Tore within a couple of dives
customer_reviews.text: Wet suit tore (1-2" long) along the stitches within a couple of dives. Called Seavenger and they said that it was beyond the 30 day Amazon return policy and so they couldn't do anything. Apparently there is no warranty beyond the 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Atish Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality ratio.
customer_reviews.text: Price for quality ratio is very good here. Suit has good stretch for thickness and plenty warm for most relatively cold applications. I'm a male just under 5'8", 40" chest, 30-32 waist on pants, 165 pounds athletic build and the large was definitely the right sizing for me. The only issue was the neck was slightly uncomfortable but my neck is more than 17" so that will most likely not be an issue for most people, especially once in the water. If you're worried about the neck would still order to try on. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & style
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and followed size guide by seller & what others had posted. I'm 5'9 176 ordered size 11. It fits perfectly!! Length is good in arms & legs...would work for someone up to 5'11..up to 185lbs The wrist and ankles are snug, as expected for a wetsuit. I have not used in the water. I will update my post with a follow up review. Very happy with this purchase. Follow up: Great diving suit! Fit was excellent, very comfortable, good stretch to suit, warm water diving...this kept me warm on the deeper depths and 2nd & 3rd dives
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Recommended wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with this wetsuit and find it fairly comfortable. I use it for teaching swim lessons in a relatively cool pool. It fits well. I actually tried two sizes and went with the smaller size (I was borderline between the two sizes). The only reason for giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I've had a couple problems with the zipper getting stuck. Looking forward to using it for outdoor activities such as snorkeling (minimize use of sunscreen that can damage coral reefs). Being black, I find it doesn't look nearly as bad on me as I had expected!
customer_reviews.author: Weston, CT

customer_reviews.title: Definitly worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this suit for the deep dives I was going to do on a trip in about 80 degree water. I get cold easily, but this kept me warm at 80ft. I'm 5'5" and 150lbs and the size 7 fit snuggly. It was a little tighter than I would prefer, but I was pretty sure the 8 would be too big and, even fitting snug, I didn't notice the neck being overly constricting like so many other suits I've tried. I was extremely impressed with the quality in that, despite how and where I tugged on it, my fingernails did not go through the material. At this price, I would most certainly recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: slang955

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little odd...okay for the money thus far.
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak as to the fit so far, will update next time I dive. I am 5’11”, 200 pounds. Waist measures 39” around navel, chest measures 44”. I went with a XXL. I don’t think an XL would have gone on my arms or thighs, but I have a little extra length on the arms. Fit isn’t great across shoulders or arms. Seems that like most wetsuits, it is made for skinny dudes. If I were 2” taller, it would be fine, but for an XL, I’d need to lose like 15 pounds of muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great suit for the price. I'm 132LBs and 5' 5", typically a size 6, and I ordered the size 9. It's a little long in the legs and arm area for me, but I prefer it to be a little loose for ease of taking it off and putting it on. I love the knee pads, give me extra traction on the surfboard. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for sport divers
customer_reviews.text: This will have little more buoyancy than your more expensive wetsuits, but for the occasional sport diver you can't go wrong. I followed other feedback regarding size; therefore, ordered one size larger and it fit like a glove and worked great. I found the buoyancy a little more than my prior body glove wetsuit, but wasn't in the market to spend $300. Regarding quality, this is well made and after 18 dives shows no signs of use. I suspect it will last about 10 years without issue until the neoprene starts to compress and loose its ability to hold warmth.
customer_reviews.author: C. Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'10" 160 lb female and I got a 9. I was really unsure about it because according to their sizing chart I should be a 13, but the 9 fits perfectly. Better than any other wetsuits I have tried on. I have long legs and arms and this was perfect. A little tight to get over my hips, but its doable. Seems like a really good, basic wetsuit for the price; I'm excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: mkb43

customer_reviews.title: Too tight esp. around neck - going back
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 7 based on recommendations on the product site. Its wayyy too tight and feels like I am being strangled around the neck. Going back. I am 5"4" and 137 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 2xl for my 14 year old son. 5'8.5", 205 lbs, 42" chest, 40" waist. Probably could have gotten away with an XL, but he's still growing and we will be using in warm water, so we don't need it to be super tight. I expect him to be able to wear it next year unless he grows 6 inches. Stretchy. Easy zipper. Like the reinforced knees. Very happy with it. Will update after we get it in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, but there's better gear
customer_reviews.text: The suit doesn't leak water, offers UV protection for long days out in the water. It is very hard to put on, and I found it to be a little tighter than the size specified. My only complaint is that I found it didn't keep me that warm, even during January in the Bahamas. I found myself having to find other ways to warm up, even during day diving. Otherwise, it's a great suit.
customer_reviews.author: Noah J.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are amazing. This is my first wet suit and I can say it works well. I was in 50 degree water with 60 degree air temperature and I never got cold. It seams to hold the water out for 10 to 20 second and when it's in it warms up and you don't even notice. After a couple hours I forgot I had it on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Men's Size M is tight for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8" and 150 Lbs. with 32" inseam. I bought a size Medium. It's very tight, especially around the neck. Uncomfortable. So if you are bigger or any taller than me you might want to consider the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: John Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, but sizing all wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a normal sized Male Human 5'11' 175lb and the XL was too small and the XXL was too small. Even with 2 sizes above what is suggested, I could not stand up straight the torso was too short, my gems were crushed, I can't lift my arms above my shoulder and the arms and legs length are waaay to long. It seems to have been modeled after someone who was short and fat with spider arms. The quality seemed well constructed but awful design for sizing. Returned twice, now looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hind

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FIT AND SLEEK DESIGN!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about fit based on all the reviews that I got. I'm 5'10, 178 lbs, stats are @ 36x28x40 and I got a size 9. It fitted like a glove! Literally! I did not feel claustrophobic at all. It fits and feels great!! I'm waiting for the water to get a bit cooler... so I will update once I actually go in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Rionda G.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, but poor fit
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit seemed to be good quality neoprene but the sizing was way off, and it was way too tight in the crotch area. I’m 5’11” 220lbs and wear a XL shirt. I bought the XXL based on other people’s reviews, and it fit my entire body very tight, especially my arms and crotch area. The crotch area was unbelievably uncomfortable. It was pushing “everything” inside me. I would have used it if the crotch wasn’t so tight. I think for the men’s version, they should add a little material in that region like other wetsuit manufacturers to make a little extra room. I’m thinking as a woman’s wetsuit, this would work very well however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it fit perfect. Tight and snug in all the right spots
customer_reviews.text: I’m a male 5’4 and weigh 160. I ordered a Medium. I was worried about it being too long as usually everything is because I’m short af. But it fit perfect. Tight and snug in all the right spots. Made my butt look like a warm apple pie on a hot autumns day. Easy to zip off and take off by yourself too.
customer_reviews.author: colten

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Saved my skin, literally. This is a great wet suit. Priced right. You want it to fit snug, so pay attention to the size chart. Measure yourself correctly and don't size up. Yes, it will take time to get on but it will actually fit properly when you get into the water. If you size up wate will leak into the arm and legs. Well designed and great zipper construction. I am pleased with it and would buy again. I believe mine will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Imagination Station Gallery LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit seems to do the job. I am about 5’5 at roughly 135 lbs. I got the women’s size 7 and it fits well. The wrist bands are a little tight but I opted to put a small cut in them rather than pay 4x’s the amount for another suit. I tried on several suits at our local scuba store and hated all of them. They were way more money and this one was more comfortable over all...for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Bought a women's size 3 for my wife, who is 5'1" and 105 lbs. The neck feels a bit tight on land, but once in the water it fits her perfectly and kept her plenty warm during a week of scuba diving in 80-81 degree water. Couldn't be happier with it. I don't know why people spend hundreds of dollars for other wetsuit brands - this Seavenger worked perfectly for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: jsp

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: Quality appears to be very good. I read many reviews to figure what size to order and got it right. I'm 5'6" 125 pounds, athletic with wide shoulders and size 5 is perfect! Will not be using in water for a few months so don't know how it performs. I shopped around and the value for this is incredible. I also purchased the gloves size small (I'm a women's L) and this combo should keep me warm in MN spring and fall paddle boarding and waterskiing.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A

customer_reviews.title: Wrists extremely tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 11 which fit my measurements per the chart. I have large bones- wear a size 10 shoe and size 8 glove and the wrists were so tight it was a struggle to try on the wetsuit. When finally on, the tight wrists cut off the circulation to my hands, Returned and got a Roxy syncro which fits everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Charis

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable & Made Well
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was constructed well, with a nice grip to it but not overly tight. The long zipper is easy to use and the simple yet sleek design of the suit is great, unlike some of the wet suits the patterns are very busy. This suit does conform to your body well. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mumzy's

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but too big!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality for the price. Unfortunately, on the size chart I land right in the middle of 9 and 11. I'm 5'7, 145 lbs, 30 waist, 38 hip and 35 bust. I got the size 11 because the reviews said they ran small. But when I tried it on, there's about an inch of excess material on the arms, back, bust and knees. I called a wetsuit alteration shop to ask how wetsuits should fit for surfing, and the woman told me if it was even slightly loose dry, it would be much worse wet. She said it should fit like a second skin. I'm returning it for a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I swim in the Pacific, and since I've gotten older and developed arthritis, I've gotten wimpier about being cold. This suit is a great value for the money. I'm a 5' 8" woman, wear a size 14 or 16 in clothes and the size 15 was perfect. Perfect for keeping these old joints comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lake

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love
customer_reviews.text: Love,love love!!!!!. I am 5 foot 4 110 poubds and ordered size 5. I was afraid it might be too big but fits perfectly everywhere!!! I actually bougjt this because i have a fish phobia and am terrified to be in,fish infested water. I can finally now swim free with this suit!
customer_reviews.author: NCleidomastoid

customer_reviews.title: So Grateful
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, fits like a glove which was SHOCKING. I'm 5'8 and thin with A cup boobs (small) and a skinny, 125ib body and things for tall girls never fit my body (too big) and things for skinny girls never fit my height (too short) but the size 5 was perfect! Mild choking was fixed with a bit of stretching around the collar. I really really appreciate the quality of the product and the speed that it got here. I'll leave another probably glowing review once I've worn it in the 50 degree F water this week!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I can not remember the size I bought. But have had for about a year now and have not had any issues. Use for kayaking early spring in cold water. Has kept me warm and sun protected. Kind of tough to get on and off. Use restroom before you put it on. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great diving suit for my beginner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 11 year old diving son, he’s average height and weighs just at 100lbs. Says it keeps him plenty warm in the Florida waters. ***the Velcro patch at the neck closure I did have to move to the right so that it didn’t fit as tight and also so the edges of the Velcro patch didn’t scratch and irritate him
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Not for swimming/triathlons.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE FOR TRIATHLON. I was on a budget and figured I would give it a shot. It’s an awesome wetsuit for diving or snorkeling but not swimming. The shoulders are to tight, so every stroke you are pulling on the material which burns your arms out quick. I’m going to use it for snorkeling when I’m at the beach, but not for swimming
customer_reviews.author: Danimal fishing

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and super cute wet suit! But unfortunately the wrong size came. I'm 4'11" & 100 lbs. I received a size 11. Had ordered size 5. I also tried a size 3 and again excellent quality, but felt super claustrophobic in it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Carchidi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! I'm completely new to surfing. My roommate started teaching me a month ago, and we went super early and the water was freezing. So he said I should buy a wetsuit. So I searched for a low price wetsuit and I found this one. I showed it to my roommate and he was a little skeptical about the quality. But he said it would probably be ok for a beginner. When the suit arrived I put it on and it was a perfect fit! And I showed it ti my m8 and he said it was actually a really good wetsuit given the price. It keeps me warm and it works perfectly when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, easy fit - but won't last long
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is really nice if you dive occasionally. I used it as main wetsuit (which mean everyday use) and in less than 3 months it started to lose of its heat-conserving capacity due to the neoprene which just got broken at many sawing lines. (though it wasn't too small or so) Once again, can last for you for long if you don't use it as intensively as I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Emese KORE

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with how this large fits me and will be ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for myself and one for my taller son. I am 5'8 with a 31" or 32" waist (lean) and a long torso; the large fits my upper body from neck to inseam VERY snug so I'll be wearing an athletic supporter to keep things from getting too uncomfortable. The legs have a little extra length but I am accustomed to that. I am very satisfied with how this large fits me and will be getting some great use from it this summer. My son is 6'2.5" and about 190# & very muscular: broad shoulders, chest, thighs, legs. He simply will not fit in the XXL.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver C Clerc

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, warm
customer_reviews.text: I used this for caving in an aquifer. I believe water temperatures were high 60's to low 70's. I did get cold at certain points in the cave but I did not wear thermals or have anything else over the wetsuit The material was very durable considering the rocks inside the cave did not tear or damage the fabric anywhere
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this suit, I only tried it on at home and it looks amazing, it fits perfectly, I am 48kg (105Ib) & 157cm (i guess that's 5"1'), I ordered size 5, it's difficult to wear but I was expecting that, I didn't want to buy a bigger size like many customers did because I don't want my suit to be loose, I can't wait to try it outside, it looks and feels great, very warm and very well made, so yeah good price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Hiba

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! I'm a big guy, approximately 5'11" and 270 pounds and the 4X suit fits me great. The suit does what it's supposed to do: keeps core temperature stable and cold water out. So far, I've only tested with water at 78 Degrees F, but the water felt nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Love this wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit! I am 5’9” and this fits me great (7). I use a skin so it slides on and off with ease. Has a nice seal at the openings and I was comfortable in the water. I despise being cold, so this really kept me happy. Snug at the wrist but it didn’t bother me. I understand it’s job is to minimize water movement over the skin. Came fast and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: JnKBos

customer_reviews.title: This is a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit, the material and of course the price! I stand 5'4", weighs 138 lbs, I got a size 7 and it fits really well. I haven't tried it yet in water though. I bought it for a dive trip to Destin, FL, but when we got there, water temp was 84-85 F, so I decided not to wear it, but by the way it looks -- I think it will do good in the water too. I will just write another review as soon as I tried it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: pnayfrtxas

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect. I am 5' 10", medium build, and got the large. It is skin tight, which is how they are supposed to fit. When I went to Hawaii a few weeks ago the wet suit was too loose and I got cold. This should work perfect. The zipper did need a little breaking in and may require a lubricant (wax).
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Competitive Swimmer Review - 1st Time Wetsuit Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good value for what I spent on this wetsuit. After reading earlier reviews, I took a risk that this wetsuit would be suitable for a competitive swimmer. This is NOT the case. If you are looking for a swim wetsuit, look elsewhere. This wetsuit is very bouyant and much thicker than a traditional competitive swimming wetsuit. Would be well suited to paddle boarding / surfing but NOT competitive swimming (ie. Triathletes, open water racers, etc). I am 5'8, 138 lbs and the small fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just as hard to get on as any other wetsuit, but I used mine for white water rafting in early spring on the Hudson river in upstate NY. Pretty sure I was the only one not shivering on the 40-45° water.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!! Awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this wetsuit when traveling in the Galapogos Islands in July during what is essentially their winter time. The water is freezing. This suit kept us warm when others with the short suits were freezing.
customer_reviews.author: KPatrick

customer_reviews.title: Zipper too short!
customer_reviews.text: Made for tall and thin. Even so, the zipper was so short, only half way down back, I could not pull wetsuit up and over shoulders. Nice material but unworkable and flawed design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: the suit fits good going up 1 size up to 2x
customer_reviews.text: the suit fits good going up 1 size up to 2x, iam 5'10 204 lbs, not fat, i had a xL for years, and a pain the butt to get on, and iam xL. but the 2x was a lot better to put on more easy, thanks for the good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Newman

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t got in the water with it yet but seems to be very good quality hope it keeps me warm in Florida’s beautiful but freezing 🥶 spring water ! I’m an in water guide looking for a wetsuit that keeps me warm in the water and easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.author: Ben J. Surufka

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit at a great price. I purchased a women's size 3, am 5'2" and 105 lbs. It fits great. Easy to put on, nice high quality material, and nice design. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Greentea

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this a pretty well constructed suit. However the neck is too high and tight and it bunches up under my arms as I am short waisted. I would like to return it for a refund; there was no packing slip or receipt in or outside the box. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for close to 20 dives so far and it has held up great. I'm 6'0", 250 lbs and the 4x was a perfect size for me. There has been some slight fraying of the wetsuit over time, but it is pretty minor and has in no way impacted overall quality at this point. Especially at this price point, I consider this to be a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great wetsuit. It is 3 mm throughout and seems to be well made. My only issue is that it runs small in my opinion. I had to go with an XXL (after returning an XL) and it was a bit snug still. I am a bit larger than I should be, but I have never needed an XXL previously.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Really great wetsuit. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really great wetsuit. I highly recommend. I am not a professional surfer or anything, but these seem great, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: herstrangemind

customer_reviews.title: I look AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: Kicks butt! Now I can swim in my pool in the winter and get exercise. I'm getting over a broken ankle and swimming is really the only thing I can do. Since I got this (which my husband thought was silly) I look AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal!! The fit was great! I am 5'9 and 155 lbs. I got the ladies size 9 and the fit was perfect. I am curvy and big chested and it hugged my curves.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 10" and 220 pounds and just lost 120 lbs so I have some loose skin. I wear a XXL scuba pro suit that fits. This isn't even close. I am keeping it in hopes that it will fit when I reach my goal of 200. I hope I don't have to sell it on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wolchick

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good but it has a weird shape. Sleeves are too large on the elbows. Not recommended for large hips
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a cruise of the Galapagos. The 3mm worked well in maintaining my warmth during extended daily (occasionally twice daily) snorkeling. No suits dry quickly. If you're new to wet suits, their are plenty of good tips on the short videos on YouTube. The price was about twice what the exhibition ship charged for five days. One or two more uses should make it pay for itself.
customer_reviews.author: G. Adriaansen

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am happy with this product. It holds my phone in place well and the shutter remote also works well. My only issue is that I wish the tripod itself went higher. It's hard to get every angle.
customer_reviews.author: Abu Hummus

customer_reviews.title: I cannot give it 5 stars because I sent it ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give it 5 stars because I sent it back, I am only 5'8", 160lbs and ordered a large as per chart. I could not get my arms in, I also fought just to get it to my hips.(I'm not over weight) This just did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: The proportions are a bit odd if you are tall or have broad shoulders. I’m 6’1” and had to get the XXL. It ends up holding in some water in the torso because it’s obviously for a bit heftier guy
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'11" and 160 pounds and size L is really good for me except a little tight in the crotch ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one for me and one for my wife. Performs excellently and keeps us warm in the Nor-Cal waters. I'm 5'11" and 160 pounds and size L is really good for me except a little tight in the crotch area, but I take that as a compliment. My wife is 5'4" and 120 lbs and women's size 5 is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mikapau

customer_reviews.title: The suit fits great, only have extra material in the leg area
customer_reviews.text: Shipped sooner than expected. I am 5’3, 138lbs and 35in hips. I stuck to the chart and ordered a size 7. The suit fits great, only have extra material in the leg area. The wrist is a bit tight, but excited to try this suit this weekend. More updates to come!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wet suit to wear while riding my Jet ski. I like how there are grip pads on the inside of the knees, this was a super important feature I was looking for when choosing a wet suit. I also like the rubber seals around the wrists and ankles, Jet skiing requires constant movement and it keeps the suit in place. Super easy to take on and off. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! :) have purchased three of this same item and every time is great, good for the price, this one is with seam dough and I dont appreciate that, there was the ''seamless'' version what i was looking for, cant find it, if you have it please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wet Suit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wet suit! I purchased it to use on a trip to the Galapagos Islands. The water temps were low to mid 60s and this suit was perfect. It was thin enough for easy on / easy off and it worked perfectly in the ocean. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Girl

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the price.We use them for kayaking on a tandem island.I jumped in 45 degree water and it kept me warm.The air temperature was 72 and my wife and I were warm the whole time.Glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I didnt want to order a 9 because I felt it would be too long so I ordered a mens medium and it was perfect! Not as tight as the womens so maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Im a 5'9" woman, 130lbs, ordered the size 7 womens. It was insanely tight, hard to get on, and hard to move in, it was also really tight around the neck. I didnt want to order a 9 because I felt it would be too long so I ordered a mens medium and it was perfect! Not as tight as the womens so maybe more water will seep in but it was much easier to put on and much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marina rando

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A tad tight around the neck, wrists and ankles if you get in a smaller size. I suggest getting the bigger size if you aren’t sure! Other than that, it kept me extremely warm!
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Great For an Orangutan
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are too long. I am 5'11" 245lbs and purchased a 4x. If you're heavy, you have to get the long-arm version to be able to get the waist you need.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Flat lock stitching is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and i just loved it! It was very comfortable and the stitching and material were of great quality. It fit to size. i am short 5'3" and it was a bit long in the leg for me but it was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit! It’s cute which is a major plus. I did size up. I’m 5 ft 7 in and the legs and arms are a little long on me but I just roll them up. I’ve used it on 2 dives so far and been comfortable in the water both times. It might be a little too restrictive to surf in but it’s great for diving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked this product a lot after trying it on but ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked this product a lot after trying it on but it was a little too small. So I am returning it. After feeling the thick material, I think I need a short version of this, not full legs and arms for the swim with the manatees. But this does seem to be a very good wet suit for the price! I didn't try it in water since it didn't fit so I can't review that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eilert

customer_reviews.title: This wetsuit fits so great! I ordered the women 7 after reading other ...
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit fits so great! I ordered the women 7 after reading other reviews about the wetsuit. I am 5'8" and 135 lbs. I have a long torso and a bit of a sway back. Most wetsuits do not formfit to my lower back and are generally too short for me in the torso. This one fits perfectly. In fact I just ordered another one because I will use it daily and will want a dry one each day! Very happy to find a fitted wetsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Bmudd13

customer_reviews.title: Works for Maine waters
customer_reviews.text: Can stay in the cold Maine waters for hours now. Size chart is stop on.
customer_reviews.author: NaKaDy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from Bonaire. I dove 8 dives in my new wet suit. It was a perfect fit. I had no issues with it. I wish it had a pocket though, but other than that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Melvin

customer_reviews.title: These are uber affordable though so will stick with them
customer_reviews.text: Large if your medium (I ordered small and had to reorder this large one - gave medium to friend). These are uber affordable though so will stick with them. If you're slightly above medium get an XtraLarge
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Go 3 sizes bigger?
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I'm normally an XL, but I ordered the 4XL and it was still too tight, but plenty tall if you are over 6 ft. I'm a 6 ft guy, but 228 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I use this for sprint triathlons, I don't like my wetsuit super super tight, and this is perfect. It's warm enough to swim in the Maine ocean and not freeze!
customer_reviews.author: J. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest wuality or most comfortable buy for the price I paid I shouldn’t be able to complain. I’m not an avid surfer but surf occasionally and these have been fine for the last 5 months. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Agnello

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible.
customer_reviews.text: It's a wetsuit, so comfort is relative. It will keep me warm, though! It appears to be well made and very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Lola J. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: For average height 5’5” or taller
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Arrived before the big swim. My only complaint is they don’t make them for petite legs. I’m 5’2” and the legs were more for 5’7 height. I had baggy ankles but it served its purpose for the polar swim.
customer_reviews.author: Annony-mouse

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It fits very well and it provides the protection I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10 and 166lbs. I got a large after looking over the sizing charts and I'm glad I did because it fits perfectly. It's warm, comfortable, and does what a good suit should do.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price, just watch sizing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who at 5"10 is really skinny with 150 pounds. Yet the sizing was a bit off. We first ordered an M, and it was too tight in some areas, then got it in L. Now the suit fits great overall and performed well on his recent dive trip to the Texas Flower Gardens (water around 75 degrees). Plus you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this wet suit, especially given the low price! Seems to be of good quality, fits well and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Would be great with a longer zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if the zipper was longer. Bought a women’s size 7, too much of a battle to get it on. Disappointing, as it’s well made. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good wet suit, specially for the price! I go wakeboarding in December here in south Texas, don't get too cold!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Younes

product_meta.title: Seavenger Alpha 3mm Neoprene Fullsuit Wetsuit
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY FABRIC — 3mm neoprene wetsuit material is ideal for warm to temperate waters.
WEAR WITH BCD — Tough shoulder and knee pads add extra strength for surfing or wearing a BCD.
PREVENTS CHAFING — Flat-lock stitching is soft and comfortable enough for all-day wear.
SUPER STRETCHY — High-flex neoprene panels in the knee and armpit maximize movement in the water.
EASY ON AND OFF — Extra long leash and a sturdy, bulky zipper makes it easy to slip in and out of.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
